title: Happily Ever Addendum
description: This is the third installment of the Modern Arrangements Trilogy.LILLIAN SNOWE has been seduced, wedded, and bedded by the reformed playboy turned husband.AIDAN IVERSION III finally has his wife and unborn children home, where he can participate in their lives and protect them. But when hurdle after hurdle is thrown in the way of their happily ever after, will they be able to survive betrayals, lies, and the realization that they may really be meant for each other after all.Join Lillie and Aidan as they fight to prove to their unknown enemy, and to themselves, that they are more than the contract they signed.
author: Sadie Grubor
